product.name: 8 Pack Black LED Wall Sconce Indoor Cool White 6000K LED Wall Lights Hardwired Up and Down Wall Light Fixture (with G9 Bulbs)
product.description:
When choosing a wall lamp for your home, you not only need to choose a lamp that you like, but more importantly, you need to choose a decorative style for your space, choose your own unique lamp, and just browse the Aiilsmp store to meet all your home lighting needs!
1. Our modern led wall sconce adopts a high-quality aluminum shell and all aluminum body design, which is corrosion-resistant and durable. The G9 bulb has high transmittance and reflects light to a delicate and luxurious effect.
2. This modern, fashionable and minimalist style wall sconces features soft lighting and upper and lower lighting, creating the best ambient lighting for your room, ensuring a comfortable atmosphere without dazzling eyes.
3. Perfect for living rooms, kitchens, restaurants, bedrooms, stairs, hotels, balconies, study rooms, corridors, shops, porches, offices, bars, villas, cafes, and other indoor lighting occasions.
Power: 9W
Material: High quality aluminum
Power supply: Hardwired
Color temperature: 6000k cold white
Lamp holder type: G9
Bulb: 9W bulb
Light direction: up and down
Input voltage: 100-240V
Life:>30000 hours
Frequently Asked Questions:
Q1: Does it come with a switch?
A: There is no a switch and plug on the lamp fixture. It is hard wired, standard 3 wires connection, just connect the reserved wires directly.
Q2: If the LED G9 bulb can be replaced?
A: Yes, it can be replaced.Maximum power 60W
Installation
1.Remove the base from the back with a screwdriver
2.Use 2 screws to secure the lamp holder to the wall
3.Connect the correct wires to your home circuit.
4.Insert the G9 LED lamp into the lamp socket and fasten it wih a screw
5.Congratulations you complete the installation,Enjoy a wonderful time
product.bullet_points:
• ►【Replaceable G9 Bulb】:The wall sconce supplied with a Energy-saving and Non-flickering 9W LED G9 bulb (6000K cool white) without switch. The bulb can be replaced,max 60W. NO battery operated.The wall lamp lampshade can be directly disassembled, and the G9 bulb inside the wall lamp can be replaced at any time.
• ►【High Quality Wall Lamp】:High quality aluminum shell and all aluminum lamp body,Strong corrosion resistance and durability, Sconces Wall Lamps using high-quality G9 light source,With high transmittance, high light efficiency, no flash, soft light, up and down lighting, protecting your eyes.
• ►【Modern Design】:The indoor wall sconces ideal for living room,kitchen,dining room,bedroom,stair and hallway.Made of high quality aluminum.High hardness,High brightness and good light transmission performance,unique design of the black led wall sconces perfectly matches various scenes
• ►【Easy to Install】: Fit US standard junction box. The modern wall sconces are easy to assemble,Wall Sconce complete installation within ONLY 3 steps. ALL fitting included.
• ►【Aiilsmp Service】:Aiilsmp always provides customers with the good product experience and the highest quality after-sales service,Please rest assured to buy, our customer service will solve your all problem within 24 hours.
